channel.title: Frontpage on fearness.org
channel.description: Recent content in Frontpage on fearness.org

item.title: The Consqences of Temptation.
item.description:
Faith has guided me to make some cosmetic changes to the website. It is inspired by Allah himself. In the name of God, the Most Gracious, the most Merciful.

During my daily prayer the Lord spoke to me and told me that he has great plans in store for me and those around me. It is now my quest to deliver to you, an updated perspective on the things you should think, feel and believe. It is not always easy to know where you stand but I will make it my constant effort to let you know where God stands on the subject. If you have any questions email me at this anti spam link questions@fearness.org

item.title: No Christmas Trees
item.description: The Bible tells us in multiple places many times to not participate in the idolization of christmas trees. Christmas trees are forbidden by the bible. If you think that christmas is okay then you are wrong and need to study the bible that the lord has brought before you. The word of the Lord endures forever.
